definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: This paper introduces and analyses David Bohm s causal interpretation of quantum potential and his viewpoint of nonlocality.
sentences.chinese: 本文評介了玻姆的量子勢因果解釋及非定域性觀點。

sentences.english: This paper examines the theory by analyzing the practices of German foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 本文通過分析德國對外政策的實踐評介了這一理論。

sentences.english: This paper presents a review on Levinson s theory of generalized conversational implicature (GCI).
sentences.chinese: 從三個方面對萊文森的一般性談話隱涵理論進行評介。

sentences.english: This paper aims at a global review on the prosaic works of the knowledgeable and productive Roman author Varro.
sentences.chinese: 本文全面地評介古羅馬作家瓦羅的散文作品。

sentences.english: The paper reviews the literature on the structural dimension of code-switching in the past thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 本文回顧評介了將近三十年的語碼轉換結構研究。

sentences.english: This part introduced the forest resources protection of legal regime our country present nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是對我國現行森林資源保護法制的評介。

sentences.english: The contents of the second chapters give a review for the fundamental theories and important policies of the Ukrainian communist party.
sentences.chinese: 第二章對烏共的基本理論與重要政策主張進行了評介。

sentences.english: The second part is the valuation and reconsideration of extra-territorial administrative review system.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分域外行政複議體制評介。

sentences.english: Critics at home have occasionally recommended this story to readers but not yet tapped it in depth.
sentences.chinese: 國內評論界雖偶有評介，但未作深入的挖掘。

definition: Prime tortoise of the record bureau, Song dynasty historical encyclopedia of political essays, autobiography, memorials and decrees, compiled 1005-1013 under Wang Qinruo 王欽若|王钦若 and Yang Yi 楊億|杨亿, 1000 scrolls
The Travels of Lao Tsan, novel by late Qing novelist Liu E 劉鶚|刘鹗[Liu2 E4]
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
a popular form of narrative literature flourishing in the Tang Dynasty (618-907) with alternate prose and rhymed parts for recitation and singing (often on Buddhist themes)
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
Concise History of the Chinese Novel by Lu Xun 鲁迅
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao3 shuo1 Shi3 lu:e4

definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia

the Book of History, one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1], a compendium of documents which make up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the time of Confucius, also known as 尚書經|尚书经[Shang4 shu1 jing1], 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], 書|书[Shu1]
